Changelog for version 1.3.0: 

- Allowed drivers to determine their own internal format for 565 background format 

- Escape the HL elevator if you saved while stuck inside of it 

- Fix progression stopper w/ mouse in inventory caused by clicking on "select" while changing items 

- Fix bug where you could get stuck in HL elevator 

- Fix missing music stingers 

- Fix getting stuck circling behind Chepito in Su.set 

- Fix unicycle guy disappearing in ly.set 

- Fix legacy softlock when using crane in EW if you press lower chain/exit buttons on the exact same frame 

- Fix rare bug where you couldn't re-enter forklift elevator from HK 

- Fix missing hotspots for striking bees, piano 

- Sm.set walk-in fix 

- Fix disappearing HUD in EW if you press escape to skip FMV after lowering chain 

- Fixed light streaking that can appear when characters move offscreen. 

- Triple the size of the PC controller dead zone
